sentences.sContent: ...a social scientist and diversity officer at Columbia university's Lamont campus...
...The growing diversity of family life comes with new possibilities as well as new challenges...
...More diversity is needed at the table when public policy is discussed...
...It wasn’t until I attended a diversity workshop that I realized the person we passed over was the perfect person...
...A better Bottom Line An open mind about diversity not only improves organizations internally...
...shift our mindsets and realize that diversity opens doors for all of us...
...Attending the diversity workshop helped me realize how much I could learn by simply asking questions and creating dialogues with my employees...

phrases.pCn: 多样性指数；歧异度指数
生态多样性；生态分岐度

words.tran: 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的
不同种类的，各式各样的
使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大

trans.tranOther: the fact of including many different types of people or things
